divs: Sighting Detailsit was a summer night, almost 9 and im was alone with my fathe���s telescope,in front of my old house (apartment) im was looking to east when im see this oval shape light flighing north to south im inmitialy now thas not an airplane because of its shape im didnt feel any emotion at that moment im was looking it like for 40 seconds its velocity was like 200 knots aproximily and it has intermediations in its lights white and light blue and im lost visual contac when the object cross a montain on the south. after that im going to the living roon with my parents im told my story to them but they didnt believe me.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Santiago
There were no other sightings in Santiago on or around June 25th 1998
Summary: a ovalshape (light) with diferent intentions of light ,white and light blue moving from north to south at almost 2000 feet of altutude
